column3: Unit struct is in position & size is correct
column5: (PHOTO for incorrect locations) Confirm Unit struct is in position and size is correct

column3: Surveyor setout completed & Bracket in position & level
column5: Surveyor setout has been completed & Bracket is in position and level. Checked T-bolts are used and nuts tightened.

column3: Hooks in position, if not, install hook according to inst. appendix
column5: Check if hooks are in position, if not, install hook according to instruction appendix 1: hook install instruction

column3: Horizontal & vertical fins amount/code correlated with panel code
column5: (PHOTO) Check horizontal & vertical fins amount/ code is correlated with panel code, fins weld and fabrication correctly (Initial on panel label)

column3: End strip capping installed within tolerance & fully caulked
column5: (PHOTO) Check end strip capping is installed within tolerance and fully caulked

column3: Fin fixing types correct & fixed with loctite
column5: Check fin fixing types are correct and fixed with loctite, A4 stainless screw material used(Initial on panel label)
Check bracket sealant (Initial on panel label)
Check 500 vertical fins fixed tightly (Initial on panel label)
Check vertical fins alignment (Initial on panel label)

column3: All gasket installed & gutter has been cleaned
column5: All gasket installed (visual) and gutter has been cleaned

column3: Panel installation - installed & fixed in position/aluminium stopping blocked
column5: (PHOTO) Panel installation- installed and fixed in position, aluminium stopping blocked installed if required
(PHOTO) Gutter plate and sleeve installed and sealed

column3: Smoke seal insulation installed & Smoke flashing installed & sealed
column5: (PHOTO) Smoke seal insulation installed & Smoke flashing installed and sealed, bottoms sills installed, Four way caulk applied

column3: If patching required, check patching plate, screws caulked
column5: (PHOTO) If patching required, check patching plate, screws are caulked
(PHOTO) Skirting fixed and sealed in position
Pelmet fixed and sealed in position
